description: Two stimulus conditions (A/B) with polynomial baseline
afni_command: 3dDeconvolve -nodata 100 2 -polort -1 -num_stimts 2 -num_glt 0 -stim_label 1 stim.A -stim_label 2 stim.B -ortvec baseline_poly_2_1.1D baseline_poly_2_1 -ortvec constant_1.1D constant_1 -stim_times 1 stim.A_times.1D SPMG1\(1\) -stim_times 2 stim.B_times.1D SPMG1\(1\) -TR_times 1 -nofullf_atall -tout -cbucket coefout -bucket statout -x1D_stop -jobs 1 -float
execution_output: ++ 3dDeconvolve extending num_stimts from 2 to 5 due to -ortvec
++ Authored by: B. Douglas Ward, et al.
++ -stim_times using TR=2 s for stimulus timing conversion
++ -stim_times using TR=1 s for any -iresp output datasets
++ ** -stim_times NOTE ** guessing GLOBAL times if 1 time per line; LOCAL otherwise
++ Wrote matrix values to file statout.xmat.1D

results.warnings: All terms require external processing and don't contribute to the R design matrix. Returning empty design matrix.
